title: T200 Fatima Pittsburgh Pirates - (Wagner, Clarke, Carey, etc) PSA 2
author: Belfast1933

posts.post_title: T200 Fatima Pittsburgh Pirates - (Wagner, Clarke, Carey, etc) PSA 2
posts.post_content:
Gorgeous T200 Fatima 1913 Pittsburg Pirates Team card - with HOFers Honus Wagner, Max Carey and Fred Clarke.

As background, I picked up this beauty several months ago as an affordable (relatively speaking) card of the iconic all time great, Honus Wagner.  As a HOF collector, it’s challenging to find a nice Wagner that isn’t priced way out of range 

As a bonus, the horizontal image of the Pirates team, the great Fatima card back and the inclusion of fellow HOFer Fred Clark make this card a great visual in a HOF display. 

$1275 delivered 

thanks

Jeff

Jeff

And don't forget HOFer Max Carey!

Nice card. Good luck with your listing.

Right!  I listed Carey in the title but forgot him in the body of the description!
